import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; function EditClient() { let {id} = useParams(); const [quote, SetQuote] = useState([]); const [error, setError] = useState(null) useEffect(()=>{ fetch(`/client/edit/?id=${id}`) .then(res => res.json()) .then((result) => { SetQuote(result)}, (error) => {setError(error)} )}) if (error){ return
Error loading data
} return (

); } export default EditClient;
